welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rancho Cucamonga, where the charm of historic Route 66 meets the beauty of the San Gabriel Mountains. We invite you to explore our vibrant city and discover its unique blend of outdoor adventure, shopping, and dining experiences. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Aloha King Hawaiian BBQ
restaurants.description: Aloha King Hawaiian BBQ is a asian restaurant located in Alta Loma.
restaurants.address: 6331 Haven Ave (Lemon Ave), Alta Loma, CA 91737

restaurants.name: The Poke Place
restaurants.description: The Poke Place is a asian restaurant located in Rancho Cucamonga.

restaurants.name: Kobe Japanese House
restaurants.description: Kobe Japanese House is a asian restaurant located in Rancho Cucamonga.

restaurants.name: Panera Bread
restaurants.description: Panera Bread is a bakery located in Rancho Cucamonga.

restaurants.name: Citrus Kitchen
restaurants.description: Citrus Kitchen is a new american restaurant located in Rancho Cucamonga.
restaurants.address: 10431 Lemon Ave (Haven Ave.), Rancho Cucamonga, CA 91737

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chino Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and airline lounges.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport is home to several international airlines and offers customs and immigration services for international travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
